overview: Trilinos is an open-source collection of scientific computing libraries designed to support the development and deployment of scalable and high-performance computational software. It offers a wide range of solvers, linear algebra routines, and parallel computing capabilities for various scientific and engineering applications.
core_features: Large collection of numerical algorithms and computational tools
Scalable parallel solvers for linear and nonlinear systems
Advanced linear algebra and optimization libraries
Support for high-performance computing (HPC) and distributed memory systems
